channel.title: TrisidiaX Problems!
channel.description: I gave my brother the TrisidiaX Finale Release client, so we could play together. But when the server is loaded up on my computer he cant connect from his computer. And when its loaded up on his computer I cant connect from my computer. I unblocked the firewall and portforwarded, so it should work! Please help me!!

item.title: TrisidiaX Problems!
item.dc:creator: @anti_man444 anti man444
item.description:
@anti_man444 wrote:

bedo911:

I gave my brother the TrisidiaX Finale Release client, so we could play together. But when the server is loaded up on my computer he cant connect from his computer. And when its loaded up on his computer I cant connect from my computer. I unblocked the firewall and portforwarded, so it should work! Please help me!!

are you sure you changed the IP?

if no listen to this kid

[quote=“Lirimoo, post:2, topic:473882”]Then you both need to connect from Localhost.
He cant connect to ur NO-IP , cause you both are maybe using the Same Internet , arent you ?[/quote]

Read full topic
